body:
I haven't used DMPlex before but I assume PETSc package recipe needs to be updated to support mesh generation.

From [this page](https://www.caam.rice.edu/~mk51/fem.html):

```
You might want to configure with

--download-triangle --with-ctetgen
--download-chaco --download-metis --download-parmetis
--download-hdf5
for automatic mesh generation, partitioning, and output.
```
 
Before looking into this, @balay could you provide some suggestions here? metis and parmetis already there. I don't see triangle, chaco, tetgen packages in Spack and wondering how easy they are to integrate.
title: Improve PETSc package with mesh interpolation
